name: Show GES columns on GES Location
action:
<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(PSW_Additional_GES_%,PSW_Labor_GES_%)*>
<*CTX ( Container(PSW_Labor_Container).Column(GES Eng).SetPermission(Editable) )*>
<*CTX ( Container(PSW_Labor_Container).Column(GES Eng % Split).SetPermission(Editable) )*>
<*CTX ( Container(PSW_Labor_Container).Column(GES_Unit_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*>
<*CTX ( Container(PSW_Labor_Container).Column(GES_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*>
<*CTX ( Container(PSW_Labor_Container).Column(GES_ListPrice).SetPermission(Editable) )*>
<*CTX ( Container(PSW_Labor_Container).Column(GES_WTW_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*>
<*CTX ( Container(PSW_Labor_Container).Column(GES_MPA_Price).SetPermission(Hidden) )*>
<*CTX ( Container(PSW_Additional_Labor_Container).Column(GES Eng).SetPermission(Editable) )*>
<*CTX ( Container(PSW_Additional_Labor_Container).Column(GES Eng % Split).SetPermission(Editable) )*>
<*CTX ( Container(PSW_Additional_Labor_Container).Column(GES_Unit_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*>
<*CTX ( Container(PSW_Additional_Labor_Container).Column(GES_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*>
<*CTX ( Container(PSW_Additional_Labor_Container).Column(GES_ListPrice).SetPermission(Editable) )*>
<*CTX ( Container(PSW_Additional_Labor_Container).Column(GES_WTW_Cost).SetPermission(Editable) )*>
<*CTX ( Container(PSW_Additional_Labor_Container).Column(GES_MPA_Price).SetPermission(Hidden) )*>
